description: An actual instantiation in time and space of a course

externalId.description: An external identifier associated with this listing

servicepointId.description: The ID of the service point associated with this listing's reserves

locationId.description: The ID of the location associated with this listing's reserves

locationObject.description: The location associated with this listing's reserves

id.description: id of this (shelf) location record as UUID.

code.description: Code of the (shelf) location, usually an abbreviation of the name.

discoveryDisplayName.description: Name of the (shelf) location to be shown in the discovery.

isActive.description: Whether this (shelf) location is active. Inactive (shelf) locations can no longer been used.

institutionId.description: The UUID of the institution, the first-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to.

campusId.description: The UUID of the campus, the second-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to.

libraryId.description: The UUID of the library, the third-level location unit, this (shelf) location belongs to.

primaryServicePoint.description: The UUID of the primary service point of this (shelf) location.

servicePointIds.description: All service points that this (shelf) location has.

items.description: The UUID of a service point that belongs to this (shelf) location.

termId.description: The ID of the term for this listing

termObject.description: The term associated with this listing

courseTypeId.description: The ID of the course type for this listing

courseTypeObject.description: The course type associated with this listing

instructorObjects.description: A listing of associated instructor objects
